issue.title: [C++] Speed up integer parsing slightly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9928](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9928). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
By exiting early out of the parsing routine when the input is exhausted, we can save a little bit a processing time.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9928?focusedCommentId=17191688) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8104
